author: jfarrell
msg: THRIFT-1707: Adjust server_spec.rb for RSpec 2.11.x and Ruby 1.9.3
The message expectations in RSpec 2.11.x don't seem to work consistently on Ruby 1.9.x when Threads are used. This is causing a problem in a few tests in server_spec.rb.

author: breser
msg: Further adjust the wording for the force argument to svn_client_add4().
(svn_client_add4): Hopefully much clearer wording on what happens when force
